name: zbra
description: - The challenge lasts for up to 3 days - counting from the time the repository invitation was sent (it's okay if you need a little more time); - The whole challenge is in english, so read it carefully; - Test instructions are inside the `instructions` directory; - Only code present in the `main` branch will be considered; - You can use whatever programming language you want!
author: Guilherme Tartarotti
